summary: Dr. Karlene V. Ross was found guilty of unprofessional conduct, failing to provide patient medical records upon proper request, and failing to cooperate with a lawful Board investigation, which included ignoring repeated requests and a subpoena. As a result, her medical license was suspended for 15 days, she was ordered to pay a civil fine of $10,000, and placed on probation for a minimum of one year, requiring her to complete a professional communication course.
